com.google.android.apps.common.testing.ui.espresso.sample

Class LongListMatchers

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.apps.common.testing.ui.espresso.sample.LongListMatchers

  • public final class LongListMatchers
extends Object
    Static utility methods to create Matcher instances that can be applied to the data objects created by LongListActivity.

    These matchers are used by the Espresso.onData(Matcher) API and are applied against the data exposed by @{link android.widget.ListView#getAdapter()}.

    In LongListActivity's case - each row is a Map containing 2 key value pairs. The key "STR" is mapped to a String which will be rendered into a TextView with the R.id.item_content. The other key "LEN" is an Integer which is the length of the string "STR" refers to. This length is rendered into a TextView with the id R.id.item_size.

    • Method Detail

      • withItemContent

        public static org.hamcrest.Matcher<Object> withItemContent(String expectedText)
        Creates a matcher against the text stored in R.id.item_content. This text is roughly "item: $row_number".

      • withItemContent

        Creates a matcher against the text stored in R.id.item_content. This text is roughly "item: $row_number".

      • withItemSize

        public static org.hamcrest.Matcher<Object> withItemSize(int itemSize)
        Creates a matcher against the text stored in R.id.item_size. This text is the size of the text printed in R.id.item_content.

      • withItemSize

        public static org.hamcrest.Matcher<Object> withItemSize(org.hamcrest.Matcher<Integer> itemSizeMatcher)
        Creates a matcher against the text stored in R.id.item_size. This text is the size of the text printed in R.id.item_content.
